description: Sum of spans of n-step polygons on square lattice.
references: A. J. Guttmann and I. G. Enting, The size and number of rings on the square lattice, J. Phys. A 21 (1988), L165-L172.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
